column1: #Text=Polycrystalline MnPt5As was synthesized by the high-temperature solid-state method.
#Text=Mn powder, Pt powder, and As powder were evenly mixed and pelletized in an argon-filled glovebox due to the toxicity of arsenic.41
#Text=The obtained pellet was placed in an alumina crucible and sealed into an evacuated silica tube (<10−5 torr).
#Text=The sample was heated up to 1050 °C at a rate of 30 °C/h and held for 2 days, followed by cooling to room temperature in 5 days.
#Text=The polycrystalline product is air and moisture stable
